data.Sentence_cn: 看第一张图片。你应该几点回家？
data.Sentence: Look at the 1st clock. When must you come home?

data.Sentence_cn: 我应该一点回家。
data.Sentence: I must come home at one o'clock.

data.Sentence_cn: 第二张图片。她应该几点去图书馆？
data.Sentence: The 2nd clock.  When must she go to the library?

data.Sentence_cn: 她应该在一点一刻去图书馆。
data.Sentence: She must go to the library at a quarter past one.

data.Sentence_cn: 第十二张图片。你和汤姆应该什么时候去看牙医？
data.Sentence: The 12th clock. When must you and Tom see the dentist?

data.Sentence_cn: 我们必须3点45分去看牙医。
data.Sentence: We must see the dentist at a quarter to four.

data.Sentence_cn: 第五张图片。你必须什么时候打这封信？
data.Sentence: The 5th clock.  When must you type this letter?

data.Sentence_cn: 我必须在两点钟打这封信。
data.Sentence: I must type this letter at two o'clock.

data.Sentence_cn: 第三张图片。萨姆和彭妮应该什么时候见老板？
data.Sentence: The 3rd clock.  When must Sam and Penny see the boss?

data.Sentence_cn: 他们应该在一点半见老板。
data.Sentence: They must see the boss at half past one.

data.Sentence_cn: 第十张图片。乔治必须几点吃药？
data.Sentence: The 10th clock. When must George take his medicine?

data.Sentence_cn: 他应该在三点一刻吃药。
data.Sentence: He must take his medicine at a quarter past three.

data.Sentence_cn: 第七张图片。索菲亚应该什么时候开车去伦敦。
data.Sentence: The 7th clock.  When must Sophie drive to London?

data.Sentence_cn: 他应该在两点半开车去伦敦。
data.Sentence: She must drive to London at half past two.

data.Sentence_cn: 第十一张图片。我应该什么时候赶公共汽车。
data.Sentence: The 11th clock. When must I catch the bus?

data.Sentence_cn: 你应该在三点半赶公共汽车。
data.Sentence: You must catch the bus at half past three.

data.Sentence_cn: 第九张图片。你应该什么时候到那？
data.Sentence: The 9th clock.When must you arrive there?

data.Sentence_cn: 我应该在三点到那。
data.Sentence: I must arrive there at three o'clock.

data.Sentence_cn: 第六张图片。他们应该几点到家。
data.Sentence: The 6th clock. When must they come home?

data.Sentence_cn: 他们应该两点一刻到家。
data.Sentence: They must come home at a quarter past two.

data.Sentence_cn: 第四张图片。你应该什么时候去见汤姆？
data.Sentence: The 4th clock. When must you meet Tom?

data.Sentence_cn: 我应该在一点四十五去见汤姆。
data.Sentence: I must meet Tom at a quarter to two.

data.Sentence_cn: 第八张图片。他应该什么时候给你打电话？
data.Sentence: The 8th clock . When must he telephone you?

data.Sentence_cn: 他应该在两点四十五给我打电话。
data.Sentence: He must telephone me at a quarter to three.
